title: Settings page with API key management
description: Create the settings page allowing users to view and manage their API keys. Include ability to create new keys, view existing keys (masked), and revoke keys.
acceptance_criteria: API Keys section showing existing keys
Key name and creation date shown
Create new key button opens form
New key shown in full ONCE after creation (copy to clipboard)
Preferences section (optional): default threshold, results per page
implementation_notes: New keys only shown once - cannot be retrieved later
Use clipboard API for copy functionality
